channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Walmart is practically begging you to buy LG's 65-inch C5 OLED TV — it's $1,500 off and an absolute bargain
item.description: Thanks to Walmart's Presidents' Day sale, our best-rated TV, LG's 65-inch C5 OLED TV, is at its lowest price ever, with a massive $1,500 discount.

item.title: OpenAI Just Hired the OpenClaw Guy, and Now You Have to Learn Who He Is
item.description: Austrian developer and former entrepreneur Peter Steinberger is largely responsible for the recent frenzy over AI agents.

item.title: Apple rattrape son retard face à YouTube et Spotify pour les podcasts vidéo
item.description: Apple (re)découvre le podcast vidéo. Le constructeur a dévoilé une nouvelle version de son application Podcasts qui prend désormais bien mieux en charge les vidéos, tout en facilitant la vie des spectateurs et des créateurs.

item.title: Apple’s Podcasts app will let you ‘seamlessly’ switch between audio and video shows
item.description: Apple is upgrading its Podcasts app to let users "seamlessly" swap between audio and video podcasts using its HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) technology. While listening to a show, users will be able to switch to a horizontal video version of the podcast and download the video versions of a podcast for offline viewing. By giving […]

item.title: Origine de la vie : des indices venus de l’espace bousculent les théories classiques
item.description: Bien des scénarios sur l'origine de la vie sur Terre la font naître dans un environnement chaud avec de l'eau liquide, notamment dans les océans de la Terre primitive et peut-être déjà pendant l'éon géologique de l'Hadéen, il y a plus de 4 milliards d'années. Et si l'on se trompait ? C'est...

item.title: This little gadget turned me into a morning person by opening my bedroom blinds automatically — and it's on sale for Presidents' Day
item.description: There's no need to splash out on expensive smart blinds when the SwitchBot Blind Tilt can do the same thing for a fraction of the price.

item.title: Switch 2 price, PS6 release could be impacted by memory shortage
item.description: Sony may be delaying the PlayStation 6, while Nintendo is contemplating a price increase for the Switch 2.

item.description: Get "clear, super-detailed footage" and package alerts, plus 16GB storage and AI person-detection if you add the Eufy Homebase hub.

item.title: La Fnac et Darty bradent à -30 % ce moniteur 500 Hz parfait pour les joueurs compétitifs sur PC
item.description: Les écrans à 500 Hz sont peu nombreux sur le marché, alors quand l'un d'eux est en promotion, ça vaut le détour de s'y intéresser. C'est le cas du MSI MAG 272QP qui affiche une dalle QD-OLED à 500 Hz pour 699 euros au lieu de 949 euros de base.

item.title: Have money, will travel: a16z’s hunt for the next European unicorn
item.description: According to a16z, it has eyes around the world in order to spot companies as early as local funds might.

item.title: Stockage d’énergie et STEP : pourquoi EDF mise encore des milliards sur cette technologie « à l’ancienne »
item.description: Les centrales hydroélectriques ne servent pas uniquement à produire de l’électricité. Certaines peuvent aussi faire office de batteries géantes, indispensables à l’équilibre du réseau électrique.

item.title: Pentagon may sever Anthropic relationship over AI safeguards - Claude maker expresses concerns over 'hard limits around fully autonomous weapons and mass domestic surveillance'
item.description: The Pentagon is threating to cut a $200 million contract with Anthropic over a rift in how the Claude AI model should be used.

item.title: This Anker battery pack solved my battery anxiety — and it’s on sale this Presidents' Day
item.description: This Anker portable charger, which is small enough for everyday carry, has become my go-to travel accessory for keeping phones and other devices powered on the move.

item.title: Apple's Podcasts app now supports HTTP Live Streaming video technology
item.description: Apple is planning a major update for its Podcasts app. The app now supports the company's HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) video technology. Previously, it only streamed video in various formats like MOV, MP4 and M4V. This provides several benefits for the end user. It lets people switch seamlessly between watching and listening, in addition to offering a horizontal full display option. It'll also make both video and audio streams available to download for offline viewing. This wasn't possible with the previous streaming method, which pulled content from an RSS-like feed. RSS is still available as a ...

item.title: iPhone Fold rumors: Everything we know so far, including the leaked design, upgrades, price and more details
item.description: Apple still hasn’t officially announced a foldable iPhone, but the rumor mill hasn’t slowed down. Over the past few months, analysts, supply-chain watchers and leakers have continued to sketch out what Apple’s first folding phone might look like and when it could finally arrive. Most signs still point to a late-2026 debut, though plenty could change between now and then.As always with unreleased Apple hardware, nothing here is confirmed. Plans can shift, features can be reworked and timelines can slip. Still, the volume and consistency of recent reporting gives us a better sense than ever of h...

item.title: Amazon réduit de 20 % le prix de ce mini vidéoprojecteur Full HD, parfait pour les petits budgets
item.description: Envie d'un vidéoprojecteur pour mater vos films et séries et vivre une expérience comme au cinéma sans payer le prix fort ? Le Philips Neopix 444 est un bon candidat : il est d'ailleurs en promotion à 299 euros contre 369 euros habituellement.

item.title: New tax rules are in effect this season—and many filers don’t know about them
item.description: New deductions and rule changes could mean a larger refund for millions of taxpayers this year. Tax filing season is in full swing, and while preparing your taxes can often be filled with stress, misplaced documents, and worries about proper filing, this year, there may be a silver lining. According to analysts, many Americans may get larger refunds in 2026 due to Trump’s 2025 One Big Beautiful Bill legislation....

item.title: I've been running Dungeons & Dragons for 12 years: here are 12 gadgets and essentials I use all the time as a DM — and 2 that I wish I had
item.description: I'm an expert DM, and these are the 12 actually useful items I can't live without — and 2 more I really want.

item.title: « Vous pouvez jailbreaker un F-35 comme un iPhone » : pourquoi les Pays-Bas envisagent de cracker leurs avions de chasse
item.description: Le fleuron de l’aviation américaine pourrait-il être « jailbreaké » aussi facilement qu’un iPhone ? C’est en tout cas la piste évoquée par l'ancien secrétaire d’État à la Défense des Pays-Bas dans le cas où les États-Unis décideraient de bloquer à distance l’utilisation de sa flotte de F-35 et de celles d’autres alliés européens.

item.title: Looking for a great deal on a KitchenAid mixer this Presidents' Day? Skip the sales and get an officially refurbished one half price instead
item.description: Find huge savings on KitchenAid's officially refurbished mixers, which come complete with warranties and full customer service.

item.title: I can't recommend this Dell laptop deal enough - this Windows 11 machine is the ultimate 'work-from-anywhere' machine in the Presidents' Day sale
item.description: The $330 Dell 15 Laptop ticks all my boxes for business or home use, with a Core 3 processor, 8GB RAM, and a fast 512GB SSD.
